articles.content: After two years of pandemic-related cancellations, Americans are splurging on "revenge travel" to make up for lost time, treating themselves to premium airfares, nicer accommodations and longer stays… [+3164 chars]

articles.author: Alex Friedman
articles.title: The SEC’s Climate Disclosure Proposal May Fundamentally Change Private Markets - Barron's
articles.description: The Security and Exchange Commission's proposal for climate disclosures will affect far more than the public markets, Novata's Alex Friedman writes in a commentary essay.
articles.content: About the author: Alex Friedman is CEO and co-founder of Novata, a public-benefit corporation.Momentous events often lead to fundamental governmental regulatory response. So it was with the Great Dep… [+5235 chars]
